subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chris Drury scored twice, sparking Buffalo’s five-goal first period in a 6-4 victory against the visiting Islanders last night. The result helped the Sabres move to within a victory of clinching the top seed in the Eastern Conference playoffs and dropped the Islanders to 10th place in the standings.
